articles.title: Dorchester school to exit state control, 2 others no longer ‘underperforming’
articles.description:
DESE praised the progress of UP Academy Holland in Dorchester Dearborn STEM Academy in Roxbury and the Fonseca Elementary School in Fall River.

The post Dorchester school to exit state control, 2 others no longer ‘underperforming’ appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Update: Dorchester school to exit state control, 2 others

Details:

DESE praised the progress of UP Academy Holland
